import {React , useState } from 'react' const AddProduct = ()=>{ const [product,setProduct] = useState({name:'' , brand : '' , price : '' , timespan : '' ,place : '' ,image:''}) const handleChangeProduct = (evt)=>{ const {id,value} = evt.target console.log(id,' ',value,' ',product) setProduct((prevState)=>( { ...prevState, [id]:value } ) ) } return(
) } export default AddProduct;
